CustomField.formula: IF(Data_Quality_Score__c=7,"All Key Fields filled in","Missing: "&IF(ISPICKVAL(EmployeesRange__c,""),"Employees Range, ","")&""&IF(LEN(EmailDomain__c)=0,"Email Domain, ","")&""&IF(LEN(Website)=0,"Website, ","")&""&IF(ISPICKVAL(Industry,""),"Industry, ","")&""&IF(ISPICKVAL(SalesTeam__c,""),"Sales Team, ","")&""&IF(ISPICKVAL(SalesTerritoryAE__c,""),"Sales Territory AE, ","")&""&IF(LEN(BillingStreet)=0||LEN(BillingCity)=0||LEN(BillingPostalCode)=0||LEN(BillingCountry)=0,"Complete Address",""))
CustomField.label: Data Quality Fields
